00001 // Funclib Graphics3d v1.0.0
00002 // 
00003 // This module contains functions for dealing with simple 3d primatives.
00004 // Use it to draw simple 3d shapes and for particles/effects.
00005 // This module requires GRAPHICS to be compiled in, some functions only work
00006 // when TEXTURES is also compiled in.
00007 // 
00008 // Contributor(s): Flatmush
00009 
00010 
00011
